content.raw:
When I try to build gazebo from: https://code.ros.org/svn/ros-pkg/stacks/simulator_gazebo/trunk

I get the following linking error:

Linking CXX shared library libgazebo_sdf_interface.so /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -l/usr/lib/libboost_thread-mt.so collect2: ld returned 1 exit status

I attached the patch with the linking fixes, although it is not a clean fix, now I can build gazebo on Ubuntu 12.04.
content.html:
When I try to build gazebo from: https://code.ros.org/svn/ros-pkg/stacks/simulator_gazebo/trunk

I get the following linking error:

Linking CXX shared library libgazebo_sdf_interface.so /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -l/usr/lib/libboost_thread-mt.so collect2: ld returned 1 exit status

I attached the patch with the linking fixes, although it is not a clean fix, now I can build gazebo on Ubuntu 12.04.
